eu.zidek.augustin.minuscule

Class PainterManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.zidek.augustin.minuscule.PainterManager

  • public class PainterManager
extends java.lang.Object
    Painter Manager makes sure that the same geometric objects share one painter.
    Author:
    Augustin Zidek

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      PainterManager(Canvas canvas)
      Initializes the PainterManager which makes sure that the same geometric objects share one painter.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      MGeometricObjectPainter getPainter(java.lang.Class<?> geometricObject)
      Returns the painter belonging to the given Class object of the geometric object.
      void registerPainter(java.lang.Class<MGeometricObject> geometricObject, MGeometricObjectPainter painter)
      Registers the given painter with the given geometric object.

      • Methods inherited from class java.lang.Object

        equals, getClass, hashCode, notify, notifyAll, toString, wait, wait, wait

    • Constructor Detail

      • PainterManager

        public PainterManager(Canvas canvas)
        Initializes the PainterManager which makes sure that the same geometric objects share one painter. PainterManager contains two methods - one for retrieving a painter for a geometric object using the object's class, the other to register new (user created) objects with painters.
        Parameters:
        canvas - The canvas for which this manager handles the getPainter queries

    • Method Detail

      • getPainter

        public MGeometricObjectPainter getPainter(java.lang.Class<?> geometricObject)
                                   throws NoPainterException
        Returns the painter belonging to the given Class object of the geometric object.
        Parameters:
        geometricObject - The Class of the geometric object (e.g. MPoint.class)
        Returns:
        Painter belonging to the given geometric object
        Throws:
        NoPainterException - If there is no registered Painter for the given geometric object

      • registerPainter

        public void registerPainter(java.lang.Class<MGeometricObject> geometricObject,
                            MGeometricObjectPainter painter)
        Registers the given painter with the given geometric object.
        Parameters:
        geometricObject - The class of the geometric object
        painter - The painter for these geometric objects
